import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Col, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Button, Modal, ModalBody, ModalHeader, ModalFooter } from "reactstrap"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Link, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import ModalRoom from '../../component/ModalRoom'; export default class RoomDetail extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { room: props.location.room, modal: false, } console.log(props.location.room); } toggleModal = () => { this.setState({ modal: !this.state.modal }) } render() { return (
Detail Room Number {this.state.room.name}
{this.state.room.roomHistories.length} Bidder
) } }
